releaseNotes:
You are going to love this update! We have revamped the app and given it a complete makeover! On top of that we have added two new Christiane Kerr bedtime meditations. Here are the new features:

- New Design
The app features a brand-new easy-to-use modern interface.

- Categories
We've merged the Store and Library pages and added a new sliding menu at the top so you can quickly find a suitable meditation.

- Favourites 
You can now mark any meditation as a favourite and keep them together in their own area.

- Breathe
Take a deep breath and enjoy the new Breathe feature narrated by Nicola Haslett from Aluna Moon. This feature will help your child relax whenever they feel stressed or anxious.

- New Sessions
We've added two brand-new Christiane Kerr bedtime meditations.

- New Audio Player & Updated Playlist Feature
Featuring skip forward and skip back, loop and a selection of backgrounds which you can slide across to suit your mood!

- Download All
We’ve added a ‘Download All’ function, which allows you to download all previous purchases in one go.

We sincerely hope you enjoy the new features and new meditations in this update.

As always, if you run into any issues, let us know at sales@hypnosisaudio.com
description:
This superb high quality children's meditation app by Diviniti Publishing features a number of children's bedtime meditation stories by best selling children's audio authors Nic & Sam, Christiane Kerr, Glenn Harrold, Christiane Kerr, Heather Bestel and Jan Yoxall. 

The app includes 4 completely free children's bedtime meditations, plus many more kids mindfulness meditations available as in-app purchases. 

The app has meditations and mindfulness tracks for children of all ages and covers a range of themes to help your kids to sleep soundly at night. The topics include sleep, bedtime, mindfulness, general confidence, anxiety, stress, self esteem and more. The meditations can help kids with feeling of confidence and motivation at school, with peer pressure and fitting in with friends and to generally feel happier and more positive. The variety of styles and themes in this kids app make it the must have children's meditation app for all situations. We will be adding more high quality tracks covering specific themes often.

The recordings are always very professionally produced and they typically work by guiding children into a natural state of relaxation through a number of carefully scripted story meditations. Each meditation story has an underlay of dreamy and gentle music combined with a calming voice make them engaging and deeply relaxing. These recordings will help children to relax and enhance feelings of contentment and also help with general relaxation, or even (in the case of Christiane's tracks), as a teaching resource.

Children’s Bedtime Sleep Meditations Features:
- 4 kids meditations to download and listen to completely free.
- High quality professional recording techniques.
- Calm reassuring voices safely guiding your kids into a completely relaxed state of mind & body. 
- Soothing background sounds for children.
- In-app purchases featuring many children's bedtime sleep meditations for boys and girls of all ages.
- Children's Breathe Feature - prompting your kids to relax through their breath.

Tracks Include:

Starlight Bedtime Meditation FREE
Sleep Meditations for Kids FREE
Magical Me FREE
Little White Feather FREE
